body.name: Baby Trend Sit N Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX with 5 Point Safety Harness, Canopy, Extra Basket, 2 Cup Holders, and Covered Compartment, Magnolia
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 21 - 23. Order within 10 hrs 24 mins.
features: Children can sit in the front and rear seats of the stroller or stand on the rear platform, this stroller is compatible with Baby Trend car seats; Maximum weight capacity recommendation is 50 pounds
Stroller is equipped with a 5-point safety harness to ensure maximum security for your child; Safety harness securely holds your child in place within the stroller
Features 2 panels with fully ratcheting canopies on the front seat and a fixed canopy with a visor for sun protection; Product Dimensions (L x W x H): 22.63 x 49.25 x 43
One-hand compact hold for easy transport; Removable rear seat converts stroller to bench and standing mode for easy carry and storage; Folded dimensions (L x W x H): 22.63 x 34.00 x 16 inches
Comes with a covered parent tray with 2 cup holders, covered compartment, and an extra-large basket for added storage giving you ample space to store essentials of your baby such as diapers and toys
body.description: The Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX with a 5-Point Harness offers an ideal solution for your baby's travel system needs. This multi-functional double stroller is designed to adapt as your child grows, making it a long-lasting investment. It can also be used with a Baby trend car seat. This stroller comfortably accommodates 2 children, with the front seat suitable for infants and the rear seat easily transforming into a standing platform for older children. This convertible baby stroller maximizes convenience for parents on the go while ensuring your children's comfort and safety through its sturdy 5-point harness. Navigating crowded places is a breeze thanks to its compact design. It features a covered compartment and an extra-large basket, providing ample storage for all your baby essentials. This travel stroller guarantees a smooth and comfortable ride for your little ones, making it an excellent choice for newborns to toddlers. The magnolia design adds a stylish touch to this stroller, while the canopy ensures effective protection from the sun and rain and its lightweight design makes the Baby Trend Stroller an ideal travel stroller for airplanes. This versatile double stroller is the practical choice for modern parents, serving as an essential item for families with young children, especially during vacations. Don't miss the opportunity to enhance your travel experience with your little ones. Order the Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX with a 5-Point Harness in Magnolia today!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller 2.0 DLX Streamlined, single front wheels allow for an easy push and a more compact footprint for the new Sit N' Stand Double 2.0. Your two will stroll in quality, comfort and style with this redesigned favorite of growing families. The Sit 'N Stand combines maximum comfort and safety with sleek style and will make your trip to the park easy and enjoyable. Both seats have a 5-point safety harness for maximum security. The front seat has a removable 2 panel fully ratcheting canopy and the rear seat has a fixed canopy to block the sun. This Stroller also includes a hassle free one-hand fold, an extra-large basket for all your travel necessities and a parent console with two cup holders and cell phone holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I take the bus everyday to work or to simply go to stores and traveling (I don't have a car). This stroller fits great and takes only 2 seats which is great and now I don't have to be folding it everytime it got full. It's smooth and my kids love it. The only thing I dislike are the brakes cause you have to get the wheels in a certain position. Overall, in love with this stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Este es un buen cochesito el diseño me encanto lo único malo esque tuve problemas con una llanta a se caía a cada rato y me fue imposible usarla como los primeros 15 minutos fui feliz usándola pero después de llanta no logré colocarla y esto se arruinó

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple set up and smooth ride.
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. I bought it for my daughter and my son who is due in a few weeks. I just assembled it myself today and it was simple to snap the wheels in place and just add the cup holder bars and sun shades. I was expecting my daughter to use the stand option as she's a little old for a standard stroller but she loved the look of the back seat so she climbed in 🤦🏽‍♀️. She loves it that way and the stroller is bigger than I expected so it holds her small frame with no problem with the baby's car seat in the front seat. Now we just wait for baby brother to come and enjoy the ride.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 2 under 2 “gang” over here. was stressing about finding a good double stroller. received the baby trend wagon last year for christmas and that’s all it lasted was about a year. Nuna car seats do fit and from my research will only fit on the 2.0 version.
